content: “DHS Secretary Janet Napolitano must be FIRED!” CFIF activists and other patriotic Americans across the country have been bombarding Congress and the White House with that very clear message. The recently released “security assessment,” in which Napolitano’s DHS blanketly targets our nation’s brave military veterans and conservative activists, is a gross abuse of power! But what was Secretary Napolitano’s reaction to your calls for action? She actually had the audacity to tell the American people that if you didn't like her insulting brush-off, her insincere apology... then tough... because that was all you were going to get! According to The Hill newspaper, "when told that some Republicans think her apology is insufficient, Napolitano said, 'I just would say to that: That’s what they’re going to get.'” And that’s not all. Others in the Obama Administration are chalking up the American people’s outrage to nothing more than “political games.” . ” When asked about the issue, Nick Shapiro, a spokesman for President Obama said, “[Napolitano] doesn’t have time for these games, and neither does the president.” Excuse us? The Department of Homeland Security labels more than two-thirds of the American people – including our veterans, pro-life activists, border-security advocates, and people who believe in the Second Amendment, smaller government and federalism – terrorist threats, and the President of the United States “doesn’t have [the] time?” There is some good news to report, however. Despite the Obama Administration thumbing its nose at the American people on this issue, your faxes, phone calls and letters are starting to work. Some in Congress are hearing you loud and clear. Several Members of Congress are also now demanding Napolitano’s resignation or firing. According to Congressman John Carter (R-Texas): *http://www.cfiflistmanager.net/firenapolitanoii1.html* SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA

content: As long as there are people like this one out there, we all have reason to be worried and thankful that Napolitano and HS is on top of the threat, whether we like the vernacular they use or not. http://forums.military.com/eve/forums/a/tpc/f/5291911282/m/4050087122001 Can you not feel the hatred in that post or see the potentials? The on-going internet campaign of lies, half-truths and fear-mongering directed against the current administration, and the President in particular, could easily be the breeding ground from which some knucklehead, or group of knuckleheads, decide to take direct action to "save" America from Barack Obama. And, no, I'm not offering this thought in support of the President. I would have said the same thing in support of George Bush had he been the target of such outrageous and dangerous distortions manipulated from behind the scenes by people willing to destroy America in the name of political expediency. He took his share of it, but I don't recall it reaching the level where the threat to his personal safety was as great as what we see now. Maybe it was and I was unaware of it because I don't frequent radical left-wing sites any more than I do radical right-wing ones. I would hope, though, that if it was this bad on those sites and HS issued a similar watch on them, we'd all say "Thank God they're aware of it!"

content: Why was she given the position instead of someone with some military experience? She is simply eyewash and window dressing. But her lack of military awareness of any kind makes her a threat to those who should be her allies, simply because of her naive careless attitude towards us - She has looked for an enemy, and out of blindness to the illegals and foreigners overrun the country, she chose to make it us!! She should be forced to resign!! Wandering and Wondering

content: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: She has looked for an enemy, and out of blindness to the illegals and foreigners overrun the country, she chose to make it us!! She should be forced to resign!! And what do you suggest be done about the Bush Adminsitration people who wrote the report? Public hanging? Firing Squad? Of course not - because the people who wrote the report were members of the Bush Administration - and King George and his minions could do no wrong... Homeland Security Secretary Napolitano didn't write the report or commission the report (the report was commissioned by Michael Chertoff, Bush's Homeland Security Secretary - who never served a day in the U.S. military) - she just publically released what Bush Administration flunkeys wrote... The proper title of this thread should be: "We now find out what Michael Chertoff and President Bush really thought of us"

content: During her reign as Arizona's governor, Napolitano displayed an equally visible distain for the problems and concerns centering around the border security failures within the state. So, why should she, in her new 'rubber stamp position', show any more concern for our nation as a whole? Before you ask...I am a resident of Arizona.

content: Ms Napolitano is merely a member of the leftist intelligensia who now control the country. If she seems aloof and superior to normal Americans it is because she, like her boss, have been assured that they are by others of her kind. They don't give a good fuzzy ---- about this country or the people in it. They are here to redistribute the entireity of America, her wealth, her power and her most famous asset, her people, among those who for so long have gazed upon our shores with bitter envy.
